text: Karkkila is a city in Finland. About 9,111 people lived there as of 31 May 2013. Nearby municipalities include Lohja, Loppi, Tammela and Vihti. ==Some villages== Ahmoo, Alimmainen, Haavisto (Karkkila), Järvenpää (Karkkila), Karkkila, Nyhkälälä, Siikala, Tuorila, Vaskijärvi (village), Vattola and Vuotinainen. ==Population growth== http://pxweb2.stat.fi/Dialog/varval.asp?ma=060_vaerak_tau_107&ti;=V%E4est%F6+kielen+mukaan+sek%E4+ulkomaan+kansalaisten+m%E4%E4r%E4+ja+maa%2Dpinta%2Dala+alueittain+1980+%2D+2012&path;=../Database/StatFin/vrm/vaerak/⟨=3&multilang;=fi Reference ==Other websites== * Community website ==References== Category:Cities in Finland Category:Municipalities of Uusimaa
title: Karkkila
